txt.en: The Northern Forge is about to be attacked!
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Western Forge!
'Bâb kanon zuhûk!'
The Eastern Forge has been defended!
The Western Forge has been defended!
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Northern Forge!
The Eastern Forge is about to be attacked!
'What... what's causing all this shaking? Come quick!'
'These forges will be mine yet!'
Must be defending the Way of Smiths.
The Western Forge is about to be attacked!
A Pûlpum Berserker is attacking the Eastern Forge!
The Northern Forge has been defended!
'This is some devilry from Amukh! Quick, protect the forges!'
'There, that'll hold those beasts out!'
'I'll stand guard here over the banners!'
'Unfurl these banners at the forges to strengthen the hearts of its defenders!'
Requires a furled banner to be placed on the pedestal to use.
A Pûlpum Berserker is has joined Amukh in attacking Stóthkell!
Amukh is rushing to attack Stóthkell!
Amukh has been driven off!
